result.title: Power converter to welding industrial demonstrator (Task 5.2.2, Month 40)
result.description: One or two different size welding power sources to be build. In case of result of project two different component size/types to be developed (smaller discrete and larger module IGBTs) then both component types can be demonstrated at different size power source. In case only one component type is available, then one demonstrator. Demonstrator will include also new development at another component related to developed IGBT (ie. driving circuit, passive components etc.) and comparative tests to other technologies.
